name: Giana
description:
This is another Adventure of "Giana Sisters". There are ten levels to solve and in the last appears a dragon. You can collect extras, the first transforms you to a punk, the second is thunder, which you can shoot white balls. The last extra is the strawberry which aims the target.

The controls are with cursor-keys, with space-bar is shoot. The most monsters you can shoot or jump on, but some monsters you cant kill, you must jump over them.

I have taken almost the C64-Graphics by Manfred Trenz, the Music is the original by Chris Huelsbeck.
